entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
